Title: Prohibits expenditure of state, local or public authority moneys relating to federal terrorism trials in the state of New York
Summary: Prohibits the expenditure of state, local and public authority moneys relating to any civilian criminal trial of enemy combatants for acts of terrorism in any federal court in the state of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to prohibit the expenditure of state and local funds relating to any trial of enemy combatants at any federal court in the state of New York
